definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: Your proposal still has much to recommend it.
sentences.chinese: 你的建議還是有很多可取之處的。

sentences.english: Envy has no other quality But that of detraction from virtue.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒除了損壞美德外，別無可取之處。

sentences.english: Your plan has very little to recommend.
sentences.chinese: 你的計劃幾乎毫無可取之處。

sentences.english: Even the most annoying co-workers often have something to teach.
sentences.chinese: 就連最討厭的同事通常也有可取之處。
